edu.usm.cos420.assignment1.service

Interface CustomerRepository

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomerRepositoryImpl

    public interface CustomerRepository
    A repository service interface to define actions to be performed on the collection of Customer entities.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCustomer(Customer customer)
      Add a Customer to the system

      Remove the Customer with the given ID from the system

    • Method Detail

      • addCustomer

        void addCustomer(Customer customer)
        Add a Customer to the system
        Parameters:
        customer - the Customer to be added

      • findCustomersByName

        java.util.List<Customer> findCustomersByName(java.lang.String name)
        Find a specific Customer from the system
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the Customer
        Returns:
        the Customer with the given name or null if none is found

      • findCustomersById

        Customer findCustomersById(int idNum)
        Find a specific Customer from the system
        Parameters:
        idNum - the ID of the Customer
        Returns:
        the Customer with the given ID or null if none is found

      • getAll

        java.util.List<Customer> getAll()
        Get all the Customer's currently in the system
        Returns:
        list of all Customer's in system

      • deleteById

        void deleteById(long id)
        Remove the Customer with the given ID from the system
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the customer to delete

      • updateCustomer

        void updateCustomer(Customer updatedCustomer)
        Update an existing Customer in the system
        Parameters:
        updatedCustomer - the altered Customer instance. Must have the original ID for the change to be correct
